register.description: End Of Interrupt number specification

bitfield.description: Software End Of Interrupt (EOI) control. Write number of interrupt output.

register.description: Per-event raw interrupt status vector (DM interrupt). Raw status is set even if event is not enabled. Write 1 to set the (raw) status, mostly for debug.

bitfield.description: Settable raw status for Logical Channel n to 0 (n=NB_DM_LCH-1) For each bit of the bit field: Read 0: No event pending Read 1: Event pending Write 0: No action Write 1: Set event (debug)

register.description: Per-event 'enabled' interrupt status vector (DM interrupt). Enabled status is not set unless event is enabled. Write 1 to clear the status after interrupt has been serviced (raw status gets cleared, that is, even if not enabled).

bitfield.description: Clearable, enabled status for Logical Channel n to 0 (n=NB_DM_LCH-1) For each bit of the bit field: Read 0: No (enabled) event pending Read 1: Event pending Write 0: No action Write 1: Clear (raw) event

register.description: Per-event interrupt enable bit vector (DM interrupt). Write 1 to set (enable interrupt). Readout equal to corresponding _CLR register.

bitfield.description: Enable for Logical Channel n to 0 (n=NB_DM_LCH-1) For each bit of the bit field: Read 0: Interrupt disabled (masked) Read 1: Interrupt enabled Write 0: No action Write 1: Enable interrupt

register.description: Per-event interrupt enable bit vector (DM interrupt). Write 1 to clear (disable interrupt). Readout equal to corresponding _SET register.

bitfield.description: Enable for Logical Channel n to 0 (n=NB_DM_LCH-1) For each bit of the bitfiled: Read 0: Interrupt disabled (masked) Read 1: Interrupt enabled Write 0: No action Write 1: Disable interrupt

register.description: Data mover source address for context n (Byte address, must be aligned on 128-bit boundary)

bitfield.description: Source address of transfer

register.description: Data mover source address for context n (Byte address, must be aligned on 128-bit boundary)

bitfield.description: Source address of transfer

register.description: Data mover source address for context n (Byte address, must be aligned on 128-bit boundary)

bitfield.description: Source address of transfer

register.description: Data mover source address for context n (Byte address, must be aligned on 128-bit boundary)

bitfield.description: Source address of transfer

register.description: Data mover destination address for context n (byte address, must be aligned on 128-bit boundary)

bitfield.description: Destination address of transfer

register.description: Data mover destination address for context n (byte address, must be aligned on 128-bit boundary)

bitfield.description: Destination address of transfer

register.description: Data mover destination address for context n (byte address, must be aligned on 128-bit boundary)

bitfield.description: Destination address of transfer

register.description: Data mover destination address for context n (byte address, must be aligned on 128-bit boundary)

bitfield.description: Destination address of transfer

register.description: Data Mover Context n. A new DM transfer can be scheduled only if this register has been writen by SW.

bitfield.description: 1: Send End Of Logical channel notification on transfer completion 0: Do not send End Of Task notification on transfer completion
1: Transfer is scheduled on logical channel start notification 0: Transfer is scheduled on write to ICONT_DMCONTEXT register
Type of transfer

bitenum.description: Transfer from DTCM to transversal port of DMA_IVA
Transfer from SL2 to Transversal port of DMA_IVA

bitfield.description: Number of bytes to transfer (must be a multiple of 128b)

register.description: Data Mover Context n. A new DM transfer can be scheduled only if this register has been writen by SW.

bitfield.description: 1: Send End Of Logical channel notification on transfer completion 0: Do not send End Of Task notification on transfer completion
1: Transfer is scheduled on logical channel start notification 0: Transfer is scheduled on write to ICONT_DMCONTEXT register

bitfield.description: 1: Send End Of Logical channel notification on transfer completion 0: Do not send End Of Task notification on transfer completion
1: Transfer is scheduled on logical channel start notification 0: Transfer is scheduled on write to ICONT_DMCONTEXT register

register.description: Data Mover status register for context n.

bitfield.description: 00: LCHn is in IDLE state. Descriptor is free to be programmed (or transfer completed). 01: LCHn is in WAIT FOR HW EVENT state. Descriptor is programmed and is waiting for a hardware event in order to be queued. 10 : LCHn is in either QUEUED state, in ON GOING state, or in COMPLETED state. 11 : Reserved.

bitfield.description: 00: LCHn is in IDLE state. Descriptor is free to be programmed (or transfer completed). 01: LCHn is in WAIT FOR HW EVENT state. Descriptor is programmed and is waiting for a hardware event in order to be queued. 10 : LCHn is in either QUEUED state, in ON GOING state, or in COMPLETED state. 11 : Reserved.
